query:
SELECT gl.id, gl.loja_id, l.nome as loja_nome, gl.gestor_id, u.name as gestor_nome, gl.created_at
FROM gestor_lojas gl
JOIN lojas l ON l.id = gl.loja_id
JOIN users u ON u.id = gl.gestor_id
WHERE l.nome IN ('Abrantes', 'Aeroporto porto', 'Águeda', 'Algés', 'Almada', 'Amadora', 'Amoreiras')
ORDER BY l.nome, gl.created_at DESC;
